name: Show All Commands
description: Open the command palette

name: Quick Open, Go to File
description: Quickly open a file

name: Change language mode
description: Change the language mode (e.g: html, css, python, etc.) for the current file

name: Format selection
description: Format the current selected line using the default formatter

name: Format file
description: Format the current file using the default formatter

name: New file
description: Open a new file on a new tab

name: New window/instance
description: Open a new instance of the editor

name: Close file
description: Close the current tab and the current file

name: Close window/instance
description: Close the current instance of the editor

name: Show Settings
description: Open the settings view

name: Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Open the keyboard shortcuts editor

name: Escape this whole
description: When something unwanted suddenly appears on your screen, try this key to quickly dismiss it

name: Move to beggining/end of a word
Extend selection to beggining/end of a word
Select all
description: Select all text in the editor

name: Copy Line
description: Copy the current line when nothing is selected

name: Cut Line
description: Cut the current line when nothing is selected

name: Paste
description: Paste the copied content from the clipboard

name: Move Line Up/Down
description: Move the whole line up or down

name: Copy Line Up/Down
description: Copy the whole line up or down

name: Remove Character Left
description: Deletes the character to the left of the cursor or deletes the selected text.

name: Remove Character Right
description: Deletes the character to the right of the cursor or deletes the selected text.

name: Remove Word Left
description: Deletes the remainging word to the left of the cursor or deletes the selected text.

name: Remove Word Right
description: Deletes the character to the right of the cursor or deletes the selected text.

name: Delete Line
description: Delete the current line

name: Insert Line Below
description: Insert a new line below the current line

name: Insert Line Above
description: Insert a new line above the current line

name: Undo action
description: Undo the last action

name: Re-do action
description: Re-do the last action

name: Jump to Matching Bracket
description: Jump to the matching bracket

name: Indent/Outdent Line
description: Indent or outdent the current line

name: Go to Beginning/End of Line
description: Move the cursor to the beginning or end of the line

name: Go to Beginning/End of File
description: Move the cursor to the beginning or end of the file

name: Split Editor
description: Split the editor window

name: Scroll Line Up/Down
description: Scroll the current line up or down

name: Scroll Page Up/Down
description: Scroll the page up or down

name: Fold Region
description: Fold (collapse) the selected region

name: Unfold Region
description: Unfold (uncollapse) the selected region

name: Fold All Subregions
description: Fold (collapse) all subregions

name: Unfold All Subregions
description: Unfold (uncollapse) all subregions

name: Fold All Regions
description: Fold (collapse) all regions

name: Unfold All Regions
description: Unfold (uncollapse) all regions

name: Add Line Comment
description: Add a line comment

name: Remove Line Comment
description: Remove a line comment

name: Toggle Line Comment
description: Toggle line comment for the current line or selection

name: Toggle Block Comment
description: Toggle block comment for the current selection

name: Toggle Word Wrap
description: Toggle word wrap for long lines

name: Find
description: Find text in the current file

name: Replace
description: Replace text in the current file

name: Go to Line
description: Open a dialog box to go to a specific line number

name: Go to Symbol
description: Open a dialog box to go to a specific symbol

name: Go to Next Error/Warning
description: Go to the next error or warning in the file

name: Go to Previous Error/Warning
description: Go to the previous error or warning in the file

name: Peek Definition
description: Peek at the definition of the symbol

name: Toggle Sidebar Visibility
description: Show or hide the sidebar

name: Toggle Sidebar Focus
description: Show and focus or unfocus the sidebar

name: Open File/Folder on the Sidebar
description: Open file or folder when having focus on the sidebar

name: Change File Tabs
description: Switch between file tabs

name: Toggle Full Screen
description: Toggle between full screen mode

name: Zoom In/Out
description: Zoom in or out of the editor

name: Save
description: Save the current file

name: Save file without formatting
description: Save file without triggering the formatter if "format on save" is enabled

name: Save As
description: Save the current file with a new name

name: Open File From Explorer
description: Open a file from the explorer

name: Reopen Closed File
description: Reopen the last closed file

name: Toggle Terminal
description: Show or hide the integrated terminal

name: Create New Terminal
description: Create a new terminal instance
